positions.description: Technologies I worked on:  Core Java, J2EE, HTML5, JavaScript, AngularJS, Web Services, Hibernate, EJB and Seam Framework.I worked on several critical modules as part of agile sprint deliveries which were targeted to develop new solutions and enhance the psychometric clinical assessments administration for examinees; scoring, reporting and assessment inventory administration.Other than development work, I also worked across project build and deployment using various technologies like Maven, Jenkins, and Conan with version control like Bitbucket/Stash.I was also intensely involved in requirement gathering from clients, requirement analysis, and preparation of design documents, development effort estimation and proposal writing.
positions.title: Systems Engineer
positions.description_html:
Technologies I worked on: Core Java, J2EE, HTML5, JavaScript, AngularJS, Web Services, Hibernate, EJB and Seam Framework.

I worked on several critical modules as part of agile sprint deliveries which were targeted to develop new solutions and enhance the psychometric clinical assessments administration for examinees; scoring, reporting and assessment inventory administration.

Other than development work, I also worked across project build and deployment using various technologies like Maven, Jenkins, and Conan with version control like Bitbucket/Stash.

I was also intensely involved in requirement gathering from clients, requirement analysis, and preparation of design documents, development effort estimation and proposal writing.

projects: [{"title":"Online Auction Application: 'Bidders Joint'","start_date":"Sep 2013","end_date":"Oct 2013","description":"The auction application is completely customer/vendor based and easily managed to auction items on web, safely and securely. It provides a platform where vendors can upload description of their items, and auction begins. The vendor has the option to close the auction. There is also a time based auction closure feature for Bidders Joint."},{},{"title":"Computer Lab Management System","start_date":"Jul 2013","end_date":"Jul 2013","description":"This was the Core Java based project using Java Swing. This application can be used at school/college levels to manage the Computer Systems/Equipments in labs."}]
